props.error: Puts the input in a manual error state
props.errorCount: The total number of errors that should display at once
props.errorMessages: Puts the input in an error state and passes through custom error messsages. Will be combined with any validations that occur from the **rules** prop. This field will not trigger validation
props.messages: Displays a list of messages or message if using a string
props.rules: Accepts an array of functions that return either True or a String with an error message
props.success: Puts the input in a manual success state
props.successMessages: Puts the input in a success state and passes through custom success messsages.
